about: Hi, I’m Soren Larsen! At Boardal, I harness the power of technology to revolutionize the surfing experience, creating intuitive and seamless digital solutions for surf enthusiasts. My professional drive is anchored in enhancing user interactions through innovative software development. Outside of Boardal, I am deeply passionate about exploring AI and machine learning, constantly seeking ways these technologies can transform web and mobile development. I actively participate in tech events, including those hosted by Santa Cruz Works, to stay updated with the latest advancements and expand my network. I’m eager to connect with fellow tech enthusiasts and professionals. Whether you’re interested in discussing the newest trends in AI, exploring collaborative projects, or just sharing a surf story, I’m all ears. Let’s connect and push the boundaries of technology together!
